document.full_text: in one sign of tensions raised by wisconsin's budget battles, a man snatched petitions from a volunteer gathering support to recall a republican state senator and drove away, police said on thursday.
document.title: wisconsin man snatches petitions aimed at republican senator
lines_and_colors: in one sign of tensions raised by wisconsin's budget battles, a man snatched petitions from a volunteer gathering support to recall a republican state senator and drove away, police said on thursday.
